pr_title: Use listCollections command to find MongoDB view

timeline.bodyText:
For multiple entries, using ImmutableMap.builder() is clearer:
ImmutableMap.builder()
    .put(...)
    .put(...)
    .put(...)
    .build()
timeline.author: martint

timeline.message:
Use listCollections command to find MongoDB view

MongoDB connector throws "not authorized on db to execute command" error
if user cannot access system.views collection.
